Attribute.name: AssertionName
Attribute.HelpText: Name of the assertion that failed enforcement.

Attribute.name: CompositeName
Attribute.HelpText: Name of the composite (apply to SOA applicaton only) against which the policy is being enforced.

Attribute.name: Endpoint
Attribute.HelpText: The URI which identifies the endpoint for which the event was triggered. For example, an HTTP require will record the URL.

Attribute.name: AgentMode
Attribute.HelpText: Mode in which agent performed policy enforcement.

Attribute.name: ModelObjectName
Attribute.HelpText: Name of the Web service, client or SOA component name against which the policy is being enforced.

Attribute.name: Operation
Attribute.HelpText: For SOAP requests, the operation for which the event was triggered.

Attribute.name: ProcessingStage
Attribute.HelpText: Processing stage during which the policy enforcement occurred.

Attribute.name: Version
Attribute.HelpText: Version of the policy that is being enforced.

Attribute.name: Protocol
Attribute.HelpText: The procotol of the request.

Event.name: CheckAuthorization
Event.HelpText: Generated when enforcing an authorization policy

Attribute.HelpText: Name of the Web service or client name against which the policy is being enforced.

Attribute.name: Operation

Attribute.name: ProcessingStage
Attribute.HelpText: Processing stage during which the policy enforcement occurred.

Attribute.name: Version
Attribute.HelpText: Version of the policy that is being enforced.

Attribute.name: Protocol
Attribute.HelpText: The procotol of the request.

Category.name: PolicyEnforcement
Category.HelpText: This set of events is for message protection and overall policy enforcement.
